contents:
送楼主一个翻译，葱油们可以去给外国人看：
After COVID-19, China will definitely face extremely bad international public opinions, which is destined to be inevitable. why? Because in terms of the epidemic prevention and control, China has set a benchmark for success that no other country can achieve, let alone surpass. This benchmark is so clear and striking that many countries are so bitter about it. They can only use lies and swearing to try to deny its existence.

Source: People's Daily (?)
